data.message: How do you activate this?  The link with "more info" not at all helpful.

replies.message: Hey Laura. You don't need to activate Safety Check. If you are in the affected area, you will get a Facebook notification, see an alert at the top of your News Feed and receive an SMS from Facebook (if you have SMS enabled), asking if you are safe. Clicking on any of these messages will take you to Safety Check where you can mark yourself safe and check on others. In addition, you will see a bookmark on Facebook that takes you directly to the Safety Check. You may also search for Safety Check through the Facebook search bar.  -Hailey
Thank you for your detailed reply Hailey!
How or where do I activate SMS?
SMS is text messages on your phone. If you can receive text messages now no need to do anything.
